duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the Union City site learning management system to ensure compliance, requirements, and internal policies are up to date.
Develop, direct, and lead technical learning training functions at the Union City site.
Deliver ongoing GMP education programs to all employees, compliant with global regulatory requirements.
Apply instructional design techniques and principles to support GMP, job skills, and procedural training.
Work with management teams to support and measure technical skill development.
Evaluate the effectiveness of training systems and programs, and deliver learning solutions in an engaging manner.
Design learning interventions to meet needs, analyzing the right solution, methodologies, and technologies to maximize the learning experience.
Provide administration of the site’s Learning Management System and work with auditors and inspectors to represent and explain the Training Quality System.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree and/or 3 years of relevant experience. Training and/or Instructional Design certifications are preferred.
